abstract: Atlanta police say former boxing champion O'Neil Bell was shot to death during robbery.
lead_paragraph: O’Neil Bell, a former boxing champion, was shot to death Wednesday morning during a robbery in Atlanta, Sgt. Warren Pickard of the police said.

headline.main: Former Champion Is Shot to Death
headline.print_headline: Former Champion Is Shot to Death

snippet: O’Neil Bell, a former boxing champion, was shot to death Wednesday morning during a robbery in Atlanta, Sgt. Warren Pickard of the police said.
